youtube.title: How Loud Earbuds Cause Permanent Hearing Loss | Biology Explained
youtube.description: Learn the science behind Noise-Induced Hearing Loss (NIHL). This video explains how loud music from earbuds overworks and destroys the tiny hair cells in your cochlea, leading to permanent damage. Protect your ears and understand your biology better than you did in school!
